thread.title: Trump Attacks Travel Ban Challengers, Says 'Bad High School Student' Would Understand Order
thread.title_full: Trump Attacks Travel Ban Challengers, Says 'Bad High School Student' Would Understand Order - ABC News

author: abcNEWS
title: Trump Attacks Travel Ban Challengers, Says 'Bad High School Student' Would Understand Order
text:
President Donald Trump today attacked those challenging his travel ban, saying even a "bad high school student" wound understand the "simple" order. Trump called the order "perfectly written" as he read it aloud to members of the Major County Sheriffs' Association and the Major Cities Chiefs Association at their winter conference in Washington, D.C.
